titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Prince, at Richmond, this present yeere. 1606. By B: Charier, D: of Diuinitie, and one of the Prince his chaplaines
titleStmt.author: Carier, Benjamin, 1566-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. R[oberts] for Edmund Matts, dwelling at the signe of the hand & plough in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the hand & plough in Fleetstreete
